shakedown.title: A goblin with a fancy hat swaggers into town
message: Hahaha!! Your puny settlement now part of Glittering Territory! Ah-peeze me with shinies!
Human Peons! You no understand the might of the Glittering Army! You lucky to bow before me. Also, want some things to hold to at night; to sing me to sleep.
You got supplies? We take; we good. We have understanding?
Hahahah, you the new kid in the great Red Territory. This means me less-new-kid take your lunch. Lunch metaphor.  You make these things for us. Or else.
You dumb bok, me big Glittering Chieftain! Natural order mean you give me stuff and I no dees-tro-i you. Me want supplies. Understand?

collection_progress.title: The goblin hides elation under a scowl
message: Me back soon for stuff. Better have it, or no good for you, little hearthling.
Amazing! You show great wisdom, for a pathetic hume.
Really? Hahaha, me consider you for first-box-vassal! Be back sooo-on!
Good, good. We no crush. Today.
Puny human! You feel wra--wait, you say yes? Well then! We be back!

collection_due.title: The goblin stomps back into town
message: Glittering Army returns! Where iz stuff?
My stuff! Where iz?
We back. You pay tribute now. Where iz?
Me dreamed last night. In dream, you make me stuff; we like brothers only me no kill you. Stuff?
Want stuff now. You make? We good! You no make? You die. We all friends!

collection_failed.title: The goblin frowns so hard you can't see his eyes
message: You forgot stuff? You no make? You stain Glittering Army Honor! You die now!
You dumb boks no make my stuff?! Dooooom!!! DOOM TO ALL!!!
What? You no have my stuff? BLOOD, STABBITY, AND VEN-JENCE!
Me want to be good chieftan. Me want to be friends! But you no listen. No. You no worthy. Me must kill you, then go home. Cry for could-have-been. You cry too, except you dead.

collection_success.title: The goblin grins like a kid on Frostfeast
message: You make stuff! Me love them and pet them like puppy dumb brother ate, except better!
You make my stuff! We now bestest friends. Unless we think of reason to be not-friends. Then: death. Hang out later?
You make stuff! Me really am best chieftain!
You make stuff? Really? That never happened bef--I mean good! GUD! Me be back later!!!
Me love this! Me get stuff, moe more important, me make you feel small and sub-ser-vee-ent! Best day ever.

shakedown_refused.title: The goblin looks incredulous
message: What? You say no? Then we take! TAKE ALL THINGS!!!!
No no no. You supposed to say ‘Yes.’ You supposed to feel grateful! Try again? No? Bad! Me fix badness!
No? Me brain breaking!! Me break you!
What? Cannot believe?! Must kill!!!
You no understand. Alternative: Death. Deeeaaaattth. DEAAATTTTTHHH!!!
